definitions.definition: The sediment settled at the bottom of a liquid ; the lees in a container of unfiltered wine.
The worst and lowest part of something.
examples: I sat through the dregs of a long hectic evening.

main_definition: The sediment settled at the bottom of a liquid ; the lees in a container of unfiltered wine.
secondary_definitions: ( figuratively , the dregs ) The worst and lowest part of something.
